enumeratedValue.name: 0b000
enumeratedValue.description: Once (single) sequential

enumeratedValue.name: 0b001
enumeratedValue.description: Once parallel

enumeratedValue.name: 0b010
enumeratedValue.description: Loop sequential

enumeratedValue.name: 0b011
enumeratedValue.description: Loop parallel

enumeratedValue.name: 0b100
enumeratedValue.description: Triggered sequential

enumeratedValue.name: 0b101
enumeratedValue.description: Triggered parallel (default)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Scan is initiated by a write to CTRL1[START0] only

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Use a SYNC0 input pulse or CTRL1[START0] to initiate a scan

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No action

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Start command is issued

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Stop mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: DMA is not enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: DMA is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Parallel scans done independently

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Parallel scans done simultaneously (default)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: B converter parallel scan is initiated by a write to CTRL2[START1] bit only

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Use a SYNC1 input pulse or CTRL2[START1] bit to initiate a B converter parallel scan

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No action

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Start command is issued

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Stop mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: DMA is not enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: DMA is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Zero Crossing disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Zero Crossing enabled for positive to negative sign change

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Zero Crossing enabled for negative to positive sign change

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Zero Crossing enabled for any sign change

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Zero Crossing disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Zero Crossing enabled for positive to negative sign change

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Zero Crossing enabled for negative to positive sign change

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Zero Crossing enabled for any sign change

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: SAMPLEx channel is enabled for ADC scan

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: SAMPLEx channel is disabled for ADC scan and corresponding channels after SAMPLEx also doesn not occur in an ADC scan

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No high limit interrupt request

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: High limit exceeded, IRQ pending if CTRL1[HLMTIE] is set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No low limit interrupt request

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Low limit exceeded, IRQ pending if CTRL1[LLMTIE] is set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No zero crossing interrupt request

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Zero crossing encountered, IRQ pending if CTRL1[ZCIE] is set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: A scan cycle has not been completed, no end of scan IRQ pending

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: A scan cycle has been completed, end of scan IRQ pending

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Idle state

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: A scan cycle is in progress. The ADC will ignore all sync pulses or start commands

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Sample not ready or has been read

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Sample ready to be read

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Either: A sign change did not occur in a comparison between the current channelx result and the previous channelx result, or Zero crossing control is disabled for channelx in the zero crossing control register, ZXCTRL

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: In a comparison between the current channelx result and the previous channelx result, a sign change condition occurred as defined in the zero crossing control register (ZXCTRL)

register.name: RSLT%s
register.description: ADC Result Registers with sign extension

field.name: PD0
field.description: Manual Power Down for Converter A

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Power Up ADC converter A

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Power Down ADC converter A

field.name: PD1
field.description: Manual Power Down for Converter B

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Power Up ADC converter B

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Power Down ADC converter B

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Auto Powerdown Mode is not active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Auto Powerdown Mode is active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: ADC Converter A is currently powered up

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: ADC Converter A is currently powered down

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: ADC Converter B is currently powered up

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: ADC Converter B is currently powered down

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Auto standby mode disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Auto standby mode enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: VREFL pad

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: ANA3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: VREFH pad

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: ANA2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: VREFL pad

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: ANB3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: VREFH pad

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: ANB2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: x1 amplification

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: x2 amplification

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: x4 amplification

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: x1 amplification

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: x2 amplification

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: x4 amplification

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Perform sample immediately after the completion of the current sample

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Delay sample until a new sync input occurs

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Conversion clock frequency <= 6.25 MHz; current consumption per converter = 6 mA

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Conversion clock frequency <= 12.5 MHz; current consumption per converter = 10.8 mA

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Conversion clock frequency <= 18.75 MHz; current consumption per converter = 18 mA

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Conversion clock frequency <= 25 MHz; current consumption per converter = 25.2 mA

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: DMA trigger source is end of scan interrupt

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: DMA trigger source is RDY bits

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Scan interrupt is not enabled for this sample

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Scan interrupt is enabled for this sample
